data.title: Gates Foundation Discovery Center
data.meta_description: Explore first-hand bold, innovative solutions to the most pressing challenges globally through interactive exhibits at the Gates Foundation Discovery Center.
data.text:
Arrive Curious. Leave Inspired. Encounter powerful stories about the impact of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and its partners on improving the quality of life for billions of people locally and globally.

The Discovery Center’s interactive exhibits let you explore first-hand bold, innovative solutions to the most pressing challenges facing communities around the globe.

Bring your curiosity and leave inspired to take action on a cause you care about.

The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation Discovery Center is open 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Thur-Sat, with a public tour offered at 2 p.m. Open Wednesdays Memorial Day – Labor Day. Admission is free.
